sentence.Network_en: The entire metropolitan center possessed a high and mighty air calculated to overawe and abash the common applicant.
sentence.Network_cn: 整个市中心区有着一种高傲的神气,好像故意要让一些前来寻找职业的普通人感到惶恐不安.

sentence.Network_en: Truth does not strike a pose to overawe people but talks and acts honestly and sincerely.
sentence.Network_cn: 凡真理都不装样子吓人,它只是老老实实地说下去和做下去.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 以o开头的英语英文单词 ... overarch 在...上做拱 overawe 威慑 overbear 威压,压服,压抑.
cas&nbsp;&nbsp;vocabulary... ... constipation 便秘 overawe vt. 威慑,威震,吓住,使畏缩 let out v. 放掉,泄露,放大(衣服),出租.

list.abs: door 中央辅助设备舱门 overawing passenger door 机翼上方客舱门 center cargo door 中央货舱门 APU compartment door 辅助电源设备舱舱门 tail cone lower door.
It is important not to be overawed by the mathematical jargon ., 要紧的是不要被数学的术语所吓倒.
moreover , Chpter three will discuss the defect of overawing theory .此外,本部分还讨论了威慑理论的缺陷问题。
overawe 威震, overawing 偏转过度, overawing 上冲

entry.def: If you are overawed by something or someone, you are very impressed by them and a little afraid of them.

example.ex: Don't be overawed by people in authority, however important they are...
example.tran: 不管当官儿的职权有多大，都不要被他们吓倒。

example.ex: He's never been overawed or intimidated by big occasions.
example.tran: 各种大场合都没让他犯过憷。

means.word_mean: 1. subdue, restrain, or overcome by affecting with a feeling of awe; frighten (as with threats)

auth_sentence.content: These days, New York churches offer short concerts not to overawe nonbelievers but simply to open an avenue to contemplation.
auth_sentence.res_content: These days, New York churches offer short concerts not to overawe nonbelievers but simply to open an avenue to contemplation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These days, New York churches offer short concerts not to overawe nonbelievers but simply to open an avenue to contemplation.
